Let's take $1B- $10B (Don't worry; this will surely increase over time). (BTC has $200B of market Cap. This value built up in 12 years) Now let's put all these value in the formula- Value of One coin= total coins value/ total coins Minimum = $1B/ 70 B = $ 0.014 Maximum = $10B/ 30 B = $ 0.333 So, we can conclude that whatsoever would be the value of pi, it is not very convenient to consider it more than a dollar, not even half a dollar.
